Dear friends,

I stuck to it. I set myself a three-month goal, and the result is here.

I’m proud, happy and relieved (not gonna lie!) to present to you MyActorTemplate.com (UPDATE: It’s on hold, the business model wasn’t working, I have a new idea in mind). This officially makes me an actor who creates websites for actors, and I like the idea of it! I put a lot of thought and work into it, so feel free to spread the love!

And of course, who isn’t behind Cumberbatch for the Oscars – if you haven’t seen The Imitation Game, you should probably run for your life and see it.

Happy holidays!
